text: The Government of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa is based in the city of Peshawar, the provincial capital of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa province, Pakistan. Category:Government of Pakistan The chief minister of kpk is ( Mahmood khan). Chief secretary is M.Salim. Governor of kpk is ( Shah Farman). I.G kpk is ( M.Naaem Khan). Chief Minister of Education is Shafqat Mehmood. Judge of High court is Waqar Ahmed Saith.
title: Government of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
